CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 21, 1953, pg. 13 reads: "Kappa Silhouettes Make Presentation - One or two children will be able to attend the Irene Kaufmann Settlement day camp this summer thanks to the generosity of the Kappa Silhouettes. Here Mrs. Alfred Witcher presents a check to Sidney J. Lindenberg, director of the Settlement House.  Mrs. Marcus Blakemore, left, is president of the Kappa Silhouettes, the wives of members of Kappa Alpha Fraternity.  These women have made previous donations to the Heart Fund and the Center Avenue YMCA membership drive, in keeping with their aim of assisting worthy charity projects. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mrs. Marcus Blakemore watching Mrs. Alfred Witcher presenting check to Sidney J. Lindenberg, director of Irene Kaufmann Settlement House, posed in office of Irene Kaufmann Settlement House
